name: DarkMeta
description: DarkMeta is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Neon City â€” a dangerous megalopolis obsessed with power, glamor, and ceaseless body modification. Enter a world of spectacular graphics, a wide range of fully functional NFTs and Play-to-Earn rewards. Download the DarkMeta Playable Demo for Windows. DarkMeta is one of the fastest growing play-to-earn multiplayer role-playing games (MMORPG) on Arbitrum (ARB). DarkMeta is also one of the most anticipated play-to-earn games of the year. DarkMeta has amassed a huge social community across Twitter, Discord, and Telegram and already has an incredible playable demo for Windows, with a Mac version coming soon. DarkMeta has a highly diverse and passionate team of 27 members, which includes a management team from leading prestigious business institutions and a talented game development team responsible for creating some of the most exciting games in the industry.
